forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the city stirs from slumber, a whisper of drizzle plays coy with the clouds above, softly draping San Francisco in a gray shroud. The air carries a gentle chill, hinting at the lingering warmth of summer, but just beneath that surface lies a fresh breath of autumn, ushering in a day where the sun will attempt to reclaim its throne. As the hours unfurl, expect a tide of clarity to sweep away the fog, revealing patches of blue that beckon to be explored. 

With a high near seventy emerging from the early gray, it would be wise to dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater against the morning coolness, shedding it later for something more breathable when the sun asserts itself. While the allure of the coastline may tease with promises of golden rays, consider instead a stroll through the vibrant streets downtown, where a morning coffee can stir the senses and a wander into local bookstores may yield unexpected treasures. A quiet yet pleasant day lies ahead, perfect for moments of reflection mingled with walks in the lingering warmth.
